events.message: I purchased a jacket last week, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit well.
The issue has been classified as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the jacket.
The refund request case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the return process and refund.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return the jacket and receive a refund. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged?
My order number is 4598712, and the jacket is completely new; I just tried it on once but did not wear it outside.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days using our prepaid return label. Once received, we will process your refund in 3-5 business days.
That sounds good, thanks! I will send it back today using the return label you mentioned.
We have received your returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow a few days for the amount to appear on your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and to see if you need any further assistance with your account.
Since everything is settled with your refund, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
